(ST-2000-7) State Population Estimates and Demographic Components of Population Change:
            Annual Time Series, April 1, 1990 Census to July 1, 2000 Estimate

The 4/1/1990 Census figure shown in this table is the population estimates base.  It is an
update of the 4/1/1990 Census figure shown in previous Census Bureau reports and
reflects governmental unit boundaries legally effective as of January 1, 2000, including any
post-1990 corrections and other changes due to annexations, new incorporations, or mergers.
The 7/1/2000 Estimates were created without knowledge of the Census 2000 results.

Source:  Population Estimates Program, Population Division, U.S. Census Bureau, Washington, DC  20233
Contact: Statistical Information Staff, Population Division, U.S. Census Bureau (301-763-2422 or pop@census.gov)

Internet Release Date:  November 1, 2005
   

       FIPS       
Number Code      7/1/2000    7/1/1999    7/1/1998    7/1/1997    7/1/1996    7/1/1995    7/1/1994    7/1/1993    7/1/1992    7/1/1991    7/1/1990    4/1/1990
